post.body: Jim Edmonds made catches more difficult than they should have been. Where did you see that?
nice! And they won too!
same plug as your iPods and such. I have a bunch lying around the house.
hahaha, haven't seen the schedule yet. I watched about 15 minutes of it and changed the channel. They'll figure shit out.
my first email was a spam email advertising super slim milk shakes.
Aruba is great. I feel bad to ever be on my comp. I should not look at this damn thing. Tomorrow, the beach is calling me.
We are off to Aruba. Goodbye everyone. I'll miss all you jerks.
RT @chrispirillo: WARNING! There's a phishing scam running rampant on Twitter: http://tinyurl.com/9rmfy6
sitting in a hotel with thin walls. my in-laws can hear lilly 5 rooms down.
Boston skyline from our hotel room http://twitpic.com/zdbz
I have the word synonymous stuck in my head :/
Addicted to hot stove banter now. I should be sleeping. Will peavey be a cub this year???
Ah, all this talk of macworld is getting me excited. I hope my appletv isn't obsolete before I open it.
Very busy day today. Must pack and ship things (gifts) to Chicago and prepare for out date with Aruba :)
MLB Network starts now. My wife is going to hate this channel.
I feel like playing video games. Must get lilly to sleep first.
...and they had to wake him up by putting him on a ladder and brush him with a large sweeper brush thing. It was crazy.
Just dreamt that I saw @Righellis on tv because he went on some super NYE celebration from las vegas to Chicago. He ended up passing out...
Head hurts.
Mmmmm, bacon wrapped scallops. I've had a few, I won't lie.
